subject: Re: Testing classes that generate graphics.
msgSnippet: ... Thanks for the suggestion.  We were already thinking along these lines but it seemed a bit kludgy.  But now that we can call it regression testing we
messageBody:
>
> --- tchaffee@... wrote:
>> I have an class that will draw vertically centered, line-wrapped text
>> onto a background image[....]
>
> How about visually verifying the behavior on sample request with sample
> background. Save the sample background and result. Repeat the request
> in a test and verify the request still builds the sample. Classic
> regression testing. Anytime you break the test, by changing how the
> graphics are created, you are forced to reverify.
>

Thanks for the suggestion. We were already thinking along these lines but
it seemed a bit kludgy. But now that we can call it "regression testing" we
will feel comfortable enough to use this approach!

Thanks again,
Todd Chaffee
